name: park_hop_1
description: This project is meant to be a starting for homework/projects. It is Rails 6 API app with React frontend. ### Clone repo git clone ... ### Github setup in database.yml  replace all repository name with new name Rails db:create Bundle Rails db:migrate Rails db:seed Git remote remove origin Git remote -v (check it’s gone) Install new repo (git remote add origin …..URL) Rails s -p 3001

scripts.build: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build && npm run deploy && echo 'Client Built'
